text.headline: The Apogee Club
text.text: The Apogee Club, formerly The Three Rivers Golf Club project, is a 1,218-acre private golf club located on the west and east side of SW Kanner Highway. The property is north of SW Bridge Road in Stuart. The club includes three 18-hole golf courses with extensive practice range and short game facilities, a par 3 course. The property will have no permanent residential units. The original application was submitted on December 8, 2021, and the staff report was issued on March 11, 2022.
